## Package Summary

### Description
This report will give you a high level description of a package


```{r results='asis'}
DT::datatable(data = reporter$get_description()
              , rownames = FALSE
              , options = list(searching = FALSE
                               , pageLength = 50)
              )
```

### Num Objects

Number of objects

```{r echo=FALSE}
reporter$get_objects()
```
